requirements.description: The Services are designed for general audiences and are not intended for children.
We do not intentionally collect Personal Information from children under the age of 13.

type.summary: No collection of personal information from children under 13

requirements.description: If we become aware that a child under the age to provide lawful consent to processing in their region has provided us with Personal Information, we should be contacted at DPO@unity3d.com.

type.summary: Reporting mechanism for unintended collection of children's personal information

requirements.description: The age of consent varies by region, such as 13 in the U.S., 16 in the E.U., and 16 in Japan.

type.summary: Varying age of consent for data processing by region
